name: Ars Magica Video Game
blurb: The Ars Magica RPG comes to the PC, as a 2D simulation and generational role-playing video game... "Ars Magica: Years of Conquest"

rewards.reward: No Reward
Gifted: Thank you for the help! You will be given a set of three wallpapers made from the characters of the game.
Grog: the rewards of Gifted, a Digital copy of the Game, and a unique adventure only for KickStarter patrons.
Redcap: the rewards of Grog and a Digital copy of the Soundtrack, which will contain traditional and early Medieval inspired music.

Custos: the rewards of Redcap, and a Digital copy of the Years of Conquest Anthology. This Anthology will contain 13 stories, each themed around one of the Hermetic Houses, leading up to the events of the game.
Companion: the rewards of Custos and the Years of Conquest T-Shirt, with one of the secret scenes of the Bayeux Tapestry on the back. Just be careful, in case a historian wants to study you.

Apprentice: the rewards of Companion, and a Digital copy of the Art Book. Our Art Book will contain sketches, pre-production and production artwork, and will be annotated by the designers, writers and artists.

\u2666 Collector's Box Edition \u2666 The rewards of Apprentice, the Map, the Digital World Guide, the Disc Game and the Collector's Boxed Set. A textured paper map, and a detailed guide to the world of 1000-1100 A.D. awaits you at this level. You'll also receive a total of two copies of the game, one on disc and the other digitally. You will appear in the Credits as Magi and Magae.

\u2666 Collector's Digital Edition \u2666 Contains all the Digital products: the Wallpaper, Game, Soundtrack, Anthology, Art Book, World Guide, and House Diedne. House Diedne is a full Fifth Edition Ars Magica sourcebook for this most mysterious of Houses, and covers both the Years of Conquest and the standard game timeframe of 1220 A.D. You will appear in the Credits as Magi and Magae. *Not inclusive of previous rewards.*

\u2666 House Diedne Collector's Edition \u2666 Contains a Digital copy of the Game, and the Collector's House Diedne book. The Collector's version of the Diedne book has a leatherette foil-stamped cover, higher-quality and heavy coated interior paper stock, plus a surprise or two, and will only be available from KickStarter. You will appear in the Credits as Magi and Magae. *Not inclusive of previous rewards.*

\u2666 House ex Miscellenea Storyteller's Boxed Edition \u2666 Contains the Collector's Box Edition, and we will work with you to create a reasonable magical Item for the game. This Item will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, treasures or other opportunities.

\u2666 House ex Miscellenea Storyteller's Digital Edition \u2666 Contains the Collector's Digital Edition and we will work with you to create a reasonable Spell for the game. This Spell will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, libraries or other opportunities.

\u2666 House ex Miscellenea Storyteller's Diedne Edition \u2666 Contains the House Diedne Collector's Edition and we will work with you to create a reasonable Spell for the game. This Spell will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, libraries or other opportunities.

Quaesitor: the rewards of the Collector's Box Edition, a copy of the Hard Cover House Diedne book, as well as a pdf for your electronic library. The Hard Cover Edition of Diedne is in the standard Fifth Edition format, will only be available from KickStarter.

\u2666 Storyteller's Guernicus Edition \u2666 The rewards of Quaesitor, and we will work with you to create a reasonable magical Item for the game. This Item will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, treasures or other opportunities.

Aegis of the Hearth: the rewards of Quaesitor, a Hard Cover copy of the World Guide and a pdf for your electronic library. The World Guide Hard Cover is in the standard Fifth Edition format, will only be available from KickStarter.

\u2666 Storyteller's Mercere Edition \u2666 The rewards of Quaesitor, and we will work with you to create a reasonable magical Item for the game. This Item will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, treasures or other opportunities.

\u2666 Storyteller's Merinita Edition \u2666 The rewards of Aegis of the Hearth, and we will work with you to create a reasonable Spell for the game. This Spell will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, libraries or other opportunities.

Scholar: the rewards of Aegis of the Hearth, a print version of the Anthology and a Bookmark. The Anthology will be in a trade paperback format, with cover art from our artists. The Bookmark will be leather, stamped with the esoteric symbol of the Order of Hermes.

\u2666 Storyteller's Verditius Edition \u2666 The rewards of Scholar, and we will work with you to create a reasonable magical Item for the game. This Item will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, treasures or other opportunities.

\u2666 Storyteller's Tytalus Edition \u2666 The rewards of Scholar, and we will work with you to create a reasonable Spell for the game. This Spell will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, libraries or other opportunities.

Librarian: contains a Digital copy of the Game, the print Anthology, the Bookmark and Collector's Editions of Diedne and the Worldguide. The Collector's versions have a leatherette foil-stamped cover, higher-quality and heavy coated interior paper stock, plus a surprise or two. These Editions will only be available from KickStarter. *Not inclusive of previous rewards.*

\u2666 Storyteller's Bonisagus Edition \u2666 The rewards of Librarian, and we will work with you to create a reasonable magical Item for the game. This Item will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, treasures or other opportunities.

\u2666 Storyteller's Jerbiton Edition \u2666 The rewards of Librarian, and we will work with you to create a reasonable Spell for the game. This Spell will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, libraries or other opportunities.

Archmage: the rewards of Scholar, the Collector's Art Book, and the Diedne and Worldguide Books are upgraded to the Collector's Editions. The Collector's versions have a leatherette foil-stamped cover, higher-quality and heavy coated interior paper stock, plus a surprise or two. The Collector's Art Book will be in full color. These Editions will only be available from KickStarter.

\u2666 Storyteller's Bjornaer Edition \u2666 The rewards of Archmage, and we will work with you to create a reasonable magical Item for the game. This Item will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, treasures or other opportunities.

\u2666 Storyteller's Criamon Edition \u2666 The rewards of Archmage, and we will work with you to create a reasonable Spell for the game. This Spell will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, libraries or other opportunities.

House ex Diedne: the rewards of Archmage, and a Collector's Journal. This Journal is a chestnut brown hand-made soft cover journal. It has a strap closure to protect the pages, and uses a medieval-style binding with exposed stitching on outer spine. It is stamped with the esoteric symbol of the Order of Hermes, so that the Redcaps might know it contains official Order business.

\u2666 Storyteller's Tremere Edition \u2666 The rewards of House ex Diedne, and we will work with you to create a reasonable magical Item for the game. This Item will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, treasures or other opportunities.

\u2666 Storyteller's Flambeau Edition \u2666 The rewards of House ex Diedne, and we will work with you to create a reasonable Spell for the game. This Spell will be usable and useful throughout the game, and will be acquired from merchants, libraries or other opportunities.

Primus: the rewards of House ex Diedne, and we will work with you to create a Covenant in the game. This Covenant will be visitable in the game, and will serve as a source of magic, items and resources throughout the century. We will also work with you to feature it in an adventure.

Praeco: the rewards of Primus, and we will work with you to create an Artifact and a Spell for the game. These will be usable and useful throughout the game. We will work with you to create an adventure in which the Player can acquire the Artifact and Spell.

Founder: the rewards of Praeco, and we will work with you to create a Family for the Game. This Family will feature prominently throughout the century, and will have their own saga in miniature. We will work with you to determine appropriate names, personalities and actions for the generations of Characters, and how they will be presented in the game. Additionally, we will present you with an English Walnut or Chesnut Staff, of height to your specification, with a sterling silver Order of Hermes headpiece, so that you may command the allegiance of all whom you survey. Compliance with your commands may be heavily dependent on the goodwill of those you are commanding.
